name: Arturo

services.title: UX-UI Design
services.description:
I do research work on my own and create web
pages for clients with the entire Design Thinking process, making mock ups, wireframes, user
flows, usability tests, etc.
Until now I have participated in 3 projects on my
own that are in my portfolio, Fedecoop, Tap o
meter and IIO.

services.title: Social Media
services.description: Social media content with skills in Adobe AI and PS.

services.title: Programming Skills
services.description: Html, css, js, react (learning) experience with Tailwind, bootstrap, bulma and react bootstrap.

aboutpara:
I am a graduate of the communication
sciences career, but I changed to the
design and front end area until I got to UX.
I decided to switch to this profession to
create new experiences for all kinds of
people and solve problems of daily life in a
suitable way for everyone.
